getAllContracts().notice: Returns all contract names and corresponding addresses

getContractAddressByHash(bytes32).notice: Returns contract address for the given name hash - might be address(0)

getContractAddressByName(string).notice: Returns contract address for the given name - might be address(0)

getContractAddressesByHash(bytes32[]).notice: Returns contract addresses for the given name hashes - might be address(0)

getContractAddressesByName(string[]).notice: Returns contract addresses for the given names - might be address(0)
